2. Difference between -3000 Euros (Lottery A) and 2000 Euros (Lottery B): \(-3000 - 2000 = -5000\)

Thus, the decision reason prefers Lottery B because its implicit sum of differences (0) is more favorable than the sum for Lottery A (-4000).
